verbs.description: The disabled New York Times reporter who [V: was] mocked by Donald Trump during a campaign stop in South Carolina has come forward to say that the presidential hopeful does know him .

[ARG1: The disabled New York Times reporter who was mocked by Donald Trump during a campaign stop in South Carolina] has [V: come] [ARGM-DIR: forward] [ARGM-PRP: to say that the presidential hopeful does know him] .

The disabled New York Times reporter who was mocked by Donald Trump during a campaign stop in South Carolina has come forward to say that the presidential hopeful [V: does] know him .
The disabled New York Times reporter who was mocked by Donald Trump during a campaign stop in South Carolina has come forward to say that [ARG0: the presidential hopeful] does [V: know] [ARG1: him] .
